Verses: 1 aagilum, Aaviyaanavar Velippadaiyaai Sollugirapadi, Pirkaalangalile Manasaatchiyil Soodunda Poiyarudaiya Maayaththinaale Silar Vanjikkira Aavigalukkum Pisaasugalin Ubadhesangalukkum Sevikoduththu, Visuvaasaththaivittu Vilagippovaargal.
3 visuvaasigalum Saththiyaththai Arindhavargalum Sthoththiraththode Anubavikkumpadi Dhevan Padaiththa Pojanapadhaarththangalai Vilakkavum Vendumendru Andhap Poiyar Kattalaiyiduvaargal.
4 dhevan Padaiththadhellaam Nalladhaayirukkiradhu; Sthoththiraththode Etrukkollappadumaagil Ondrum Thallappadaththakkadhalla.
6 ivaigalai Nee Sagodhararukkup Podhiththuvandhaal, Visuvaasaththirkuriya Vaarththaigalilum Nee Anusariththa Narpodhagaththilum Therinavanaagi, Yesukiristhuvukku Nalla Oozhiyakkaaranaayiruppaai.
7 seerkedum Kizhavigal Pechchumaayirukkira Kattukkadhaigalukku Vilagi,dhevabakthikkedhuvaaga Muyarchipannu.
8 sareera Muyarchi Arpa Pirayojanamulladhu; Dhevabakthiyaanadhu Indha Jeevanukkum Idharkup Pinvarum Jeevanukkum Vaakkuththaththamulladhaagaiyaal Ellaavatrilum Pirayojanamulladhu.
9 indha Vaarththai Unmaiyum Ellaa Angigarippukkum Paaththiramumaayirukkiradhu.
10 idhinimiththam Pirayaasappadugirom, Nindhaiyum Adaigirom; Enenil Ellaa Manusharukkum, Viseshamaaga Visuvaasigalukkum Ratchagaraagiya Jeevanulla Dhevanmel Nambikkai, Vaiththirukkirom.
12 un Ilamaiyaikkuriththu Oruvanum Unnai Asattaipannaadhapadikku, Nee Vaarththaiyilum, Nadakkaiyilum, Anbilum, Aaviyilum, Visuvaasaththilum, Karpilum, Visuvaasigalukku Maadhiriyaayiru.
13 naan Varumalavum Vaasikkiradhilum Buththisollugiradhilum Ubadhesikkiradhilum Jaakkiradhaiyaayiru.
14 moopparaagiya Sangaththaar Unmel Kaigalai Vaiththapodhu Theerkkadharisanaththinaal Unakku Alikkappatta Varaththaippatri Asadhiyaayiraadhe.
15 nee Therugiradhu Yaavarukkum Vilangumpadi Ivaigalaiye Sindhiththukkondu, Ivaigalile Nilaiththiru.
16 unnaikkuriththum Ubadhesaththaikkuriththum Echcharikkaiyaayiru, Ivaigalil Nilaikondiru, Ippadi Seyvaayaanaal, Unnaiyum Un Ubadhesaththaik Ketpavargalaiyum Ratchiththukkolluvaai.
